definition: radish (Raphanus sativus), esp. white radish 白蘿蔔|白萝卜[bai2 luo2 bo5]/CL:條|条[tiao2]
lit. every turnip to its hole (idiom)/fig. each person has his own position/each to his own/horses for courses/every kettle has its lid
pinyin: yi1 ge4 luo2 bo5 yi1 ge4 keng1

definition: when radishes are selling fast, one doesn't take the time to wash the soil off them (idiom)/fig. when business is booming, merchants tend to offer goods of inferior quality
pinyin: luo2 bo5 kuai4 le5 bu4 xi3 ni2

definition: see 白蘿蔔|白萝卜[bai2 luo2 bo5]
Chinese roseheart radish (shinrimei radish), green on the outside, purple-red on the inside, a favorite Beijing vegetable
one man's meat is another man's poison (idiom)/to each his own
pinyin: luo2 bo5 bai2 cai4 , ge4 you3 suo3 ai4

sentences.english: Add this to the cabbage, carrots and apples evenly.
sentences.chinese: 然後在這裏面加入等量的紫甘藍，胡蘿蔔和蘋果。

sentences.english: Radish and ginseng make people full of vitality.
sentences.chinese: 蘿蔔小人蔘，常喫有精神。

sentences.english: The carrot, of carrot-and-stick fame, is not as effective as we've been led to believe.
sentences.chinese: 蘿蔔加大棒中的蘿蔔並沒有我們相信的那麼有效。

sentences.english: The carrot, of carrot-and-stick fame, is not as effective as we've been led to believe.
sentences.chinese: 蘿蔔加大棒中的蘿蔔並沒有我們相信的那麼有效。

sentences.english: Get the carrot, onion and garlic from the broth out and throw them out.
sentences.chinese: 把胡蘿蔔，蔥和蒜從肉湯裏取出來扔掉。

sentences.english: She fed the baby on pureed carrots .
sentences.chinese: 她用胡蘿蔔泥餵養那嬰兒。

sentences.english: Effects of calcium on chilling resistance of radish cotyledons were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了鈣對蘿蔔子葉抗寒性的影響。

sentences.english: Five pieces of coal, a carrot, and a scarf are lying on the lawn.
sentences.chinese: 五塊煤，一個胡蘿蔔，一條圍巾在草地上。

sentences.english: Bell Peppers, Carrots, Beetroot, onion Rings.
sentences.chinese: 圓椒，胡蘿蔔，紫菜頭，洋蔥圈。

sentences.english: On the fourth day, they opened one of the cans of turnips and ate it.
sentences.chinese: 第四天，他們開了一罐醃蘿蔔來喫。

sentences.english: At the farmer's market I got tomatoes, cucumbers, radishes, etm.
sentences.chinese: 我在農貿市場買了些西紅柿，黃瓜，小蘿蔔等小東西。

sentences.english: Please don't eat turnip and garlic when taking this medicine.
sentences.chinese: 吃藥時不要同時喫蘿蔔和大蒜。

sentences.english: April 12. - Mustard-and-cress and radishes not come up yet.
sentences.chinese: 芥菜苗和水蘿蔔還沒長出來。

sentences.english: Add in black fungus,bell pepper and carrots.
sentences.chinese: 隨放木耳，青椒絲和胡蘿蔔絲大火翻炒。

sentences.english: They need bigger sticks and bigger carrots.
sentences.chinese: 他們需要更大的棒子，更大的胡蘿蔔。
